channel.title: Global Warming on Lionel Ragot
channel.description: Recent content in Global Warming on Lionel Ragot

item.title: Carbon Tax and OPECâ€™s Rents Under a Ceiling Constraint
item.description: We study the Markov-perfect Nash equilibrium (MPNE) of a game between oil-importing countries, who seek to maintain the atmospheric carbon concentration under a given ceiling, and oil-exporting countries.
